contract.title: Tick Tick
contract.prompt: Continue Research at the arcane College on time-delay detonation packages. Specifically ones that are a little less gargantuan.

contract.title: Hammer Time
contract.prompt: Begin research on improving Kriv's hammer to have gravity-modulating effects.

contract.title: It's Called a what?
contract.prompt: Begin research on the non-detection cloak.

contract.title: Now You Don't
contract.prompt: Continue Research at the arcane College the Invisibility cloaks. A longer duration would be nice.

contract.title: Going Green
contract.prompt: The UGK has entered an uneasy alliance with us. Let's see if that alliance could include some trade agreements.

contract.title: Settle The Scorched Lands
contract.prompt: The lands that the fire titan Coeus used to occupy now belongs to Tychicus, but no permanent Tychian establishment exists on Tychicus. In Jaroarfor, Villages must be built before towns. Towns before military camps or cities. Cities before forts.

contract.title: The Corriolis Effect
contract.prompt: Go to the Ninja Dojo and begin research on very long range crossbows!

contract.title: Scout The Aviary
contract.prompt: Our northern neighbors are enigmatic at the moment. Let's see what they're up to.
contract.followers: Rex, Fai, Evynne, Rorre, Gardonazorph, Stasi, Aramil,

contract.title: Scout The Assembly
contract.prompt: In Jaroarfor, our southern border is dominated by a race of sentient arcanic constructs, or so the rumor goes. The tribe of Razorin says that they're quite unfriendly. Let's see if the rumors are true.

contract.title: Construct the Temple
contract.prompt: The Country needs a center for it's clerics and paladins. Also, a monument to the diety got us this far is well in order. Select a construction site and get building! (the player that takes this contract first chooses what city it's built in).

contract.title: Construct the Theater
contract.prompt: A center for Bards to hang out would be ideal as well. Grab some nails and a planks of wood and get started. (The first player who takes this contract will decide which city to build it in).

contract.title: Interrogate Enemy
contract.prompt: During his solo op in Gnomerigon, Geoff captured an enemy assassin with likley ties to the an enemy assassin's guild. The prisoner could have very valuable information. Or she might try to break out and kill everyone. Should be interesting. It should be noted that the assassin is wanted in Gnomerigon for committing a massacre. If we keep holding her, they might not like that we stole her away.
contract.followers: Balasaar, Kriv, Treklor, Heiam, Geoff, Wildlovelies,

contract.title: Scout The Aviary
contract.prompt: Our northern neighbors are enigmatic at the moment. Let's see what they're up to.
contract.followers: Rex, Fai, Evynne, Rorre, Gardonazorph, Stasi, Aramil,
